name: Sounds of Food
description:
L-Click  -  Play Audio 

Drag and Drop the food on the plate!

This game contains a lot of sounds of eating different kinds of food.

If you have Misophonia, please quit the game now!

Created for Audio for Digital Games @ NYU Game Center

Instructor: Corey Bertelsen

by Hao Fan, Fang Fan, Harry Chenweizhong
